en: As soon as he came, I left.
As soon as he came, I left.

ngiemboon: Gubé yé léen ńgwáʼa yé ńgʉa lé túm metsèm.
en: His children all abandoned him to go abroad.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ tǒ, ńdeen ńgʉa pɔ́ fʉ̀ʼó.
À gÿǒ megʉa tà mé náa fàʼ né yé, á leen ńké ńgʉa.
en: He had fun until he was given the job, suddenly he left.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ toŋó yé tà à lěen ńké ńtó.
en: You called him so well that he actually came.
